text:
Hey everyone.
I feel like my question is a bit dumb, but I'm new to the dev part of a website.
I want to import a Theme previously created by a 3rd party agency on Wordpress to HubSpot Themes, but I'm not sure of whats the best way for me to do it, or what are the equivalents to make Modules, Css and Html work.
Can someone that has experience in this regard please explain briefly what's the best path to follow for me to make it work? I'm currently the only person at my company's marketing deparment hehe.

Thank you!!
